Description:
Required Skills to be successful:1.- Knowledge of Vehicles and the Used Car Market in the UAE.2.- Previous Sales Management experience.3.- Rapport and Relationship building.4.- Negotiation skills. About the Team:Reporting to the Dealer Principal and will work closely with the Sales team and internal and external stakeholders. What equips you for the role:Bachelor’s Degree.
8 -10 years’ work experience as a Sales Manager in the automotive industry.
Strong understanding of customer needs and market dynamics.
Excellent leadership and team management skills.
Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills.
Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.Job Details
